channel.title: GLITCH (fixt)
channel.description:
Borrow godsword/claws/expensive item, bank it. Log onto pvp/bh and attack someone, go back on a regular world (should have a skull) and die with the item.
lulz all round. Except for the guy who loses his godsword.
edit: it's been patched

item.title: GLITCH (fixt)
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Tbqh, I doubt it was ever real. Jagex has stated multiple times that the items on lend are not the items the original player had, they’re completely different items, they just look the same and have the same effects. The item belonging to the original player is in their possession, just not available for use until the loan has expired(it’s not visible either, obviously ;)).

Edit: Also, you’ve always been able to lose borrowed items on death, and they’ve always disappeared. Not sure why anyone thinks this time is different.

Read full topic

item.title: GLITCH (fixt)
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

testing now to see if it’s been fixed

edit: yeah it’s been patched. apparently the bug was around a while, just not well known. The guy who told me says he found it accidentally and his friend raged at him for losing his godsword

Read full topic

item.title: GLITCH (fixt)
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

I might try this now. I’ll post back to tell you if it worked or not.

Edit: IT WORKED.

I skulled in a BH world, then got my (rich) friend to lend me his whip until logout. I then went to the mage arena and died, and lost the whip. I then logged out and back in, and he didn’t get the whip back.

Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9L87zK0EzY

Read full topic
